page.title: Bp of Salisbury on the Colossians

revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Expositio epistolae D. Pauli ad Colossenses, per reverendum in Christo Patrem Joannem Sarisburiensem Episcopum in lucem edita ; olim ab eodem, Dominae Margaretae in..."
revision.text: Possibly: Expositio epistolae D. Pauli ad Colossenses, per reverendum in Christo Patrem Joannem Sarisburiensem Episcopum in lucem edita ; olim ab eodem, Dominae Margaretae in Academia Cantabrigiensi professore theologico, dictata. By John Davenant, bishop of Salisbury. (Cantabrigiae : Apud Thomam & Joannem Buck, celeberrimae Academiae typographos, Anno MDCXXX [1630]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1688893~S1
